column1: # ENTRY INDICATORS - Organized by Strategy Type / Stock Classification
# Use with --strategy-type and --stock-behavior flags for focused testing
# Uncomment indicators you want to test
# These work on stocks with ADX > 25
# Moving Average Crossovers (price crosses above MA = bullish)
# Dual Moving Average Crossovers (fast crosses above slow)
# These work on stocks with ADX < 20
# Bollinger Bands - Mean Reversion Mode (price at lower band = buy)
# Z-Score (price below -2 std devs = buy signal for mean reversion)
# These work on stocks with high breakout frequency (>15%)
# Bollinger Bands - Breakout Mode (price breaks upper band = momentum buy)
# Donchian Channels (price breaks above N-period high)
# These work on stocks with high movement intensity (>2% daily moves)
# These work on stocks with ATR% > 3%
